title: EF Grotesk or similar?
content:
Hello, I'm looking for a font similar to this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317074005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3fb0d9c0de678d6a867068288d869f10_6182.jpg)

I found the designer but as I suspected it is not available as a font, or even on display on his site anymore.

I specifically like the "squareness" of it but anything generally close to this will do. Thanks!
author: davidgtz

comments.content:
Here are 3 to look at:

Felbridge MT Std (Regular)  
PoynterGothText (Regular)  
Tahoma (Regular)
